data.name: Glaceon

attacks.name: Snow Cloak
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Glaceon during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Speed Slide
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokémon.

data.flavorText: As a protective technique, it can completely freeze its fur to make its hairs stand like needles.

data.name: Glaceon-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Second Bite
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Crystal Ray
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from Evolution Pokémon.

data.name: Glaceon

abilities.name: Freeze Zone
abilities.text: The Retreat Cost of each of your Team Plasma Pokémon in play is ColorlessColorless less.

attacks.name: Icy Wind
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

data.flavorText: It lowers its body heat to freeze its fur. The hairs then become like needles it can fire.

data.name: Glaceon

attacks.name: Ice Shot
attacks.text: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Icy Wind
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

data.flavorText: As a protective technique, it can completely freeze its fur to make its hairs stand like needles.

data.name: Glaceon

attacks.name: Blizzard
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Ice Edge
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

data.flavorText: By controlling its body heat, it can freeze the atmosphere around it to make a diamond-dust flurry.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Reflect Energy
attacks.text: Move an Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

data.flavorText: By controlling its body heat, it can freeze the atmosphere around it to make a diamond-dust flurry.

data.name: Glaceon-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Freezing Gaze
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, your opponent's Pokémon-GX and Pokémon-EX in play, in their hand, and in their discard pile have no Abilities, except for Freezing Gaze.

attacks.name: Frost Bullet
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Polar Spear-GX
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage for each damage counter on your opponent's Active Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Frost Wind
abilities.text: As long as Glaceon is your Active Pokémon, any damage done to your Pokémon by your opponent's attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Ice Blade
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Ice Bind
attacks.text: If your opponent doesn't discard a card from his or her hand, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

data.name: Glaceon LV.X
rules: Put this card onto your Active Glaceon. Glaceon LV.X can use any attack, Poké-Power, or Poké-Body from its previous level.

abilities.name: Chilly Breath
abilities.text: As long as Glaceon is your Active Pokémon, your opponent's Pokémon can't use any Poké-Powers.

attacks.name: Avalanche
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.name: Glaceon

attacks.name: Snow Cloak
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Hypnotic Blizzard
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep. This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.flavorText: It protects itself by freezing its fur into sharp needles. It can drop its body temperature below –75 degrees Fahrenheit.

data.name: Glaceon VMAX
rules: VMAX rule: When your Pokémon VMAX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Crystal Veil
abilities.text: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon VMAX, except any Glaceon VMAX.

attacks.name: Max Icicle
attacks.text: This attack also does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.name: Glaceon V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Frozen Awakening
attacks.text: Search your deck for a card that evolves from this Pokémon and put it onto this Pokémon to evolve it. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Heavy Snow
attacks.text: Discard a Stadium in play.

attacks.name: Frost Charge
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Water Energy card and attach it to this Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

data.name: Glaceon VSTAR
rules: VSTAR rule: When your Pokémon VSTAR is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Icicle Shot
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

attacks.name: Crystal Star
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from and effects of attacks done to this Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 VSTAR Power in a game.)

data.name: Glaceon

attacks.name: Hail
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Frosty Typhoon
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't use Frosty Typhoon.

data.flavorText: The coldness emanating from Glaceon causes powdery snow to form, making it quite a popular Pokémon at ski resorts.

data.name: Glaceon

attacks.name: Frost Wall
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from Evolution Pokémon.

data.flavorText: Glaceon is able to lower its body temperature very quickly. It freezes the atmosphere, creating diamond dust that glitters like gems while it flutters and dances around.

attacks.name: Permeating Chill
attacks.text: At the end of your opponent's next turn, put 9 damage counters on the Defending Pokémon.

data.flavorText: It lowers its body heat to freeze its fur. The hairs then become like needles it can fire.

attacks.name: Permeating Chill
attacks.text: At the end of your opponent's next turn, put 9 damage counters on the Defending Pokémon.

data.name: Glaceon ex
rules: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks (both yours and your opponent's).
Pokémon ex rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Frost Bullet
attacks.text: This attack also does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Euclase
attacks.text: Knock Out 1 of your opponent's Pokémon that has exactly 6 damage counters on it.
